name: Outrun Ullage
description:
You are in charge of 4 crew'men and their starship. You wanted to loot a junkyard, but some debris struck your ship and left you stranded.

The good news? Humanity has been launching junk on a one-way trip to this system for centuries. Who knows what you'll find once you look?

Salvage

Explore various wrecked ships and abandoned stations. Each one offers a variety scrap parts to gather and old machines to salvage from.

Repair

Your main goal is to send parts back that can fix your damaged ship, but you can also build to help yourself explore. Use the parts you find to fix up some of the broken machines around you, and you might just walk out with more loot than you thought possible!

Survive

Not all of these derelict ships were shut down before being sent here, and some look like military tech. Keep your eyes out for faulty defense drones. Even the old Glass Age gunpowder bullets can still be deadly when pointed at you!

Long Description:

Combine your skills of combat, exploration, engineering, and puzzle solving to make your way through ancient spaceships. Your goal is to pick them clean of parts that can be used to repair your own ship's engines. 

Your 4 unique crew members are your lives; each one matters! You can only deploy member on a mission at a time, but the other members can support support you with their skill via radio as long as you leave them on duty.

ControlsInputActionWASDMove around
ShiftRunSpacebarJump
L-CtrlCrouch
R-ClickFocus / AimL-ClickInteract / Use Item
F
Chat with the crew
F9Take Screenshot
